name: Tejas Ghodke
bio: Web developer and student at the University of Cincinnati, Cincinnati, OH. Available for COOP in Fall 2025.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
honors: Dean’s List: Summer ’23, Fall ’23, Summer ’24, Fall ’24

previous_education.stream: PCM (Physics, Chemistry, Mathematics) with Bifocal in Computer Science

experience.title: Junior Intern
highlights: Designed and implemented an advanced Python program using SpaCy and pandas to extract, parse, and organize specific data from large 5,000-word documents into formatted Excel spreadsheets for streamlined analysis.

Benchmarked against the previous internal tool, the new SpaCy-based program demonstrated a 25% speed improvement and 12% higher accuracy on a 10,000-page dataset, ensuring more reliable classification, structured representation, and seamless integration across the entire data pipeline infrastructure.

Demonstrated advanced problem-solving by designing a fully automated, scalable data pipeline that streamlined extraction, sorting, and presentation workflows, with outputs directly integrated into dynamic Power BI dashboards for enhanced data visualization accuracy and overall analytical efficiency.

experience.title: Aquatics Supervisor
highlights: Demonstrated proactive leadership within a diverse lifeguard team consisting of more than 60 lifeguards by fostering a collaborative, inclusive, and high-performance environment, and by providing ongoing mentorship, support, guidance, and constructive performance feedback to both new and veteran staff members.

Ensured full emergency preparedness by implementing detailed safety protocols, guiding lifeguards through drills, and delivering immediate, hands-on response during real-time incidents to safeguard all patrons and staff.

projects.name: Advanced Tic-Tac-Toe Game
highlights: Developed a modern, cross-platform implementation of Advanced Tic-Tac-Toe using Flutter and Dart, featuring a strategic 3x3 grid of tic-tac-toe boards with adaptive AI system and comprehensive statistics tracking.

Implemented an intelligent AI opponent with difficulty levels ranging from 0-100, featuring smart strategy evaluation, winning move detection, and opponent move blocking capabilities that adapt to player skill level.

Built a beautiful dark-themed UI with neon blue and orange accents, animated floating grid backgrounds, and responsive design that works seamlessly across Android, iOS, Web, Windows, macOS, and Linux platforms.
Established automated CI/CD pipeline using GitHub Actions for continuous deployment to GitHub Pages, ensuring the web version is always up-to-date with the latest features and improvements.

Integrated comprehensive data persistence using SharedPreferences for statistics tracking, game preferences, and user progress, creating a personalized gaming experience with persistent win/loss/draw records.

projects.name: Snake Game – AI Agent
highlights: Enhanced Patrick Loeber's Snake-AI tutorial by implementing sophisticated reinforcement learning techniques, richer game state representations, and a fully reproducible training and benchmarking pipeline for autonomous gameplay optimization.

Developed two distinct AI agents: a baseline DQN agent and an enhanced agent with deeper neural networks, improved reward shaping, and richer state representations, achieving significant performance improvements through advanced machine learning techniques.

Implemented comprehensive training infrastructure with flexible configuration options, including visual popup interfaces for debug/train mode selection, customizable game speeds, and unique model/plot/CSV saving with sequential naming for easy benchmarking.

Utilized GPU acceleration with RTX 5070 Ti (16 GB GDDR7) for efficient model training, achieving ~300% average score improvement across 10,000+ episodes through reward-based strategy refinement and optimized neural network architectures.

Created automated training and comparison workflows with multiprocessing plotting capabilities, ensuring smooth visualization during training sessions and comprehensive performance analysis between different model configurations.

fun_facts.karate: I am a black belt in Shotokan Karate, earned in 6th grade.
fun_facts.soccer: I am a huge soccer fan and a regular player. I love FC Barcelona and was captain of my high school team.
fun_facts.gaming: I enjoy gaming across all genres except tabletop RPGs like DnD. I play FIFA/EA FC, EA F1, and story-driven games like Hogwarts Legacy and Uncharted.
fun_facts.tech_preference: I prefer Android over Apple in all categories.
